name: Caveman Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner Neanderthal! Get a ridiculously awesome caveman name that's guaranteed to make you the talk of the (prehistoric) town.
introduction: Ever wondered what you'd be called if you were roaming the Earth with mammoths and sabertooth tigers? Well, wonder no more! Our Caveman Name Generator is here to transport you back to the Stone Age and bestow upon you a moniker worthy of a true cave dweller. Prepare for names that are equal parts hilarious and strangely intimidating.
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. (It's the one that doesn't involve rubbing sticks together.)
Gaze in awe as your new, ridiculously cool caveman name appears before your very eyes.
Roar it proudly! (Optional, but highly encouraged.)
Share your newfound identity with your tribe (aka your friends) and see who has the most epic caveman name!

faqs.question: Is this generator scientifically accurate?
faqs.answer: While we strive for authenticity, our primary goal is fun! Think of it as 'historically inspired' rather than a direct translation from ancient cave paintings.

faqs.question: Can I use this name for official documents?
faqs.answer: We strongly advise against it. Unless you're trying to confuse your bank teller, in which case, go for it!

faqs.question: What if I don't like the name I get?
faqs.answer: Keep hitting that 'Generate' button, my friend! The Stone Age was a time of constant evolution, and so is our generator.

faqs.question: Will this generator make me stronger and better at hunting?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, no. But it *will* make you more entertaining at parties. That's gotta count for something, right?

faqs.question: Are the names generated offensive in any way?
faqs.answer: We've worked hard to ensure that the names are lighthearted and humorous, avoiding any potentially offensive terms. It's all in good fun, just like a friendly mammoth ride!

faqs.question: Can I use this generator to name my pet?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Imagine yelling 'Oog the Destroyer' across the dog park. Instant legend status guaranteed.
